item.title: 'Fire up the deportation planes': Trump official praises Supreme Court ruling
item.description: Plaintiffs in the case want the right to challenge deportations to countries other than their own because of the risk of persecution, torture or death...

item.title: Trump says he's 'not happy' as Israel and Iran both claim ceasefire violations
item.description: Israel accused Iran of violating the ceasefire with further missile strikes â€” which Tehran has refuted, according to Iranian media.

item.title: Senators will stay in DC until Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' passes, Thune says
item.description: Majority Leader John Thune's comments are a sign of the growing pressure he faces to get Republican holdouts on board.

item.title: Can Germany afford a 5% NATO defense spending target?
item.description: Germany has said it supports a higher defense spending target even though this could leave Europe's largest economy in fiscal hot water.

item.title: World leaders react after Trump says U.S. has bombed 3 nuclear sites in Iran, including Fordo
item.description: World leaders reacted to President Donald Trump's announcement Saturday that the U.S. had carried out a "very successful attack" on three nuclear site...
